node.statement: TARGET INEQUALITY IN VECTOR FORM. The conjecture 1/Phi_n(r) >= 1/Phi_n(p) + 1/Phi_n(q) is equivalent to: 1/||h||^2 >= 1/||u||^2 + 1/||v||^2 (substituting definitions from Step 1). Clearing denominators (all quantities are positive since p,q,r have simple roots): ||u||^2 ||v||^2 >= ||h||^2 (||u||^2 + ||v||^2). Substituting u = h + alpha, v = h + beta: ||h+alpha||^2 ||h+beta||^2 >= ||h||^2 (||h+alpha||^2 + ||h+beta||^2). This is elementary algebra: multiply through by ||h||^2 ||u||^2 ||v||^2 > 0.
